option.name: notice
option.value:
~~~ Version Control Standard ~~~
Create a separate branch for implementing new features.
**** BEFORE COMMITTING ****
---> Run all unit tests to ensure functionality ---> Run maven's clean command (mvn clean or use the tool in IDE) to remove unnecessary files ---> Merge the branch into master once the feature is complete with unit tests.
~~~ Copyright ~~~
Developed by Gregory Smith & Axel Solano. Last modified $file.lastModified. Copyright (c) $today.year. All rights reserved.
